author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Plastic Omnium says it has had expressions of interest over environment arm
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Plastic Omnium:
* Co-CEO Jean-Michel Szczerba tells reporters at news conference that the company has had expressions of interest over its environment business, both from funds and from other companies in the industry
* Plastic Omnium, which makes car parts products and also runs some waste management services, had reported earlier on Thursday higher annual earnings (Reporting by Gilles Guillaume)
